channel.title: GCP Support Sandboxes
channel.description: Recent content on GCP Support Sandboxes

item.title: Empty GKE
item.description: GKE Sandbox # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Just Google Kubernetes Engine cluster List of the components used in this sandbox: GKE Cluster Click Start to go through the sandbox installation instructions. Prerequisites # You must be logged into your GCP account. Open the Google cloudshell using the following link NOTE: The next steps must be executed from within the cloudshell

item.title: Web Server + PHP + Cloud SQL
item.description: Web Server Sandbox Stack # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Web Server Sandbox stack with VM, private VPC, load balancer, private Cloud SQL Click Start to go through the installation instructions. Prerequisites # You must be logged into your GCP account. Open the Google cloudshell using the following link NOTE: The next steps must be executed from within the cloudshell

item.title: With Demo App
item.description: Cloud Composer # Deploy with CloudShell This sandbox will deploy a Cloud Composer List of the components used in this sandbox: Network Cloud Composer Environment Dataflow Pipeline Example Cloud Storage Bucket BigQuery Table Note: additional details are available in Cloud Composer Guide Configuration # Before you can deploy the sandbox please run the initialization command pointing to the hub manifest file: hub stack init -f hub-composer-demo-app.

item.title: With Demo App
item.description: GKE Sandbox # Deploy with CloudShell Description # GKE Sandbox with ingress controller and demo application List of the components used in this sandbox: GKE Cluster Nginx - ingress controller External DNS - dns record provisioner Online Boutique - Demo APP Click Start to go through the sandbox installation instructions. Prerequisites # You must be logged into your GCP account.

item.title: With Load Test
item.description: Cloud SQL with Load Test # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Cloud SQL with Load Test example List of the components used in this sandbox: VPC Network Cloud SQL K6 Example SQL Performance Test Click Start to go through the sandbox installation instructions. Prerequisites # You must be logged into your GCP account. Open the Google cloudshell using the following link

item.title: ASM with Demo App
item.description: GKE Sandbox # Deploy with CloudShell Description # GKE Sandbox with Anthos Service Mesh, ingress controller, and demo application. List of the components used in this sandbox: GKE Cluster GKE Node Pool Anthos Service Mesh Anthos Ingress Gateway DNS Zone Record Online Boutique - Demo APP Click Start to go through the installation instructions. Prerequisites # You must be logged into your GCP account.
